feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for new line regression in description.
  • v5.11.7 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10436

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.6...v5.11.7

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve HTML sanitation
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10443
  • Fixes for reserved keywords by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10454
  • v5.11.8 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10457

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.7...v5.11.8

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for html saniftation regression of QR codes
  • Improvements for calculate taxes
  • v5.11.9 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10463

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.8...v5.11.9

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix for SnapPDF when running in docker
  • v5.11.10 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10470

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.9...v5.11.10

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve performance of Html purifier.
  • Disable javascript in all invoice designs. (can be reversed by using DISABLE_PURIFY_HTML=true ).
  • Prevent deleted payments from showing in client portal.
  • v5.11.11 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10480

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.10...v5.11.11
